ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis.
An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis.

name: r-ergm

about.summary: An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.11.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ergm
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ergm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ergm/ergm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0076f5ad8727ef86194ba8a64ab3e468a47c76832e0e5fdb96caadceed7f61d1

build:
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rdpack >=2.6.1
    - r-coda >=0.19_4.1
    - r-knitr >=1.48
    - r-lpsolveapi >=5.5.2.0_17.12
    - r-magrittr >=2.0.3
    - r-mass
    - r-memoise >=2.0.1
    - r-network >=1.18.2
    - r-purrr >=1.0.2
    - r-rlang >=1.1.4
    - r-rle >=0.9.2
    - r-robustbase >=0.95_1
    - r-statnet.common >=4.10.0
    - r-stringr >=1.5.1
    - r-tibble >=3.2.1
    - r-trust >=0.1_8
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rdpack >=2.6.1
    - r-coda >=0.19_4.1
    - r-knitr >=1.48
    - r-lpsolveapi >=5.5.2.0_17.12
    - r-magrittr >=2.0.3
    - r-mass
    - r-memoise >=2.0.1
    - r-network >=1.18.2
    - r-purrr >=1.0.2
    - r-rlang >=1.1.4
    - r-rle >=0.9.2
    - r-robustbase >=0.95_1
    - r-statnet.common >=4.10.0
    - r-stringr >=1.5.1
    - r-tibble >=3.2.1
    - r-trust >=0.1_8

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ergm')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ergm')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://statnet.org
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - stevierene82

# Package: ergm
# Version: 3.10.4
# Date: 2019-06-10
# Title: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Exponential-Family Models for Networks
# Authors@R: c( person("Mark S.", "Handcock", role=c("aut"), email="handcock@stat.ucla.edu"), person("David R.", "Hunter", role=c("aut"), email="dhunter@stat.psu.edu"), person("Carter T.", "Butts", role=c("aut"), email="buttsc@uci.edu"), person("Steven M.", "Goodreau", role=c("aut"), email="goodreau@u.washington.edu"), person("Pavel N.", "Krivitsky", role=c("aut","cre"), email="pavel@uow.edu.au", comment=c(ORCID="0000-0002-9101-3362")), person("Martina", "Morris", role=c("aut"), email="morrism@u.washington.edu"), person("Li","Wang",role=c("ctb"),email="lxwang@gmail.com"), person("Kirk","Li",role=c("ctb"),email="kirkli@u.washington.edu"), person("Skye", "Bender-deMoll", role=c("ctb"), email="skyebend@u.washington.edu"), person("Chad", "Klumb", role=c("ctb"), email="cklumb@gmail.com"))
# Depends: network (>= 1.15)
# Imports: robustbase (>= 0.93.5), coda (>= 0.19.2), trust (>= 0.1.7), Matrix (>= 1.2.17), lpSolve (>= 5.6.13), parallel, methods, MASS (>= 7.3.51.4), statnet.common (>= 4.3.0), purrr (>= 0.3.2), rlang (>= 0.3.4), tibble (>= 2.1.1), dplyr (>= 0.8.0.1)
# Suggests: lattice (>= 0.20.38), latticeExtra (>= 0.6.28), sna (>= 2.4), latentnet (>= 2.9.0), rmarkdown (>= 1.12), knitr (>= 1.22), Rmpi (>= 0.6.9), testthat (>= 2.1.1), tergm, ergm.count, ergm.userterms, networkDynamic
